CustomField.description: Alias or nickname of this child (could be the child's name, address, etc) so the partner can map the child demographic info to the order items for that child.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Alias or nickname of this child (could be the child's name, address, etc) so the partner can map the child demographic info to the order items for that child.
CustomField.label: Child Alias / Nickname
